title.value: Оценка экономической эффективности поверхностного и коренного улучшения малопродуктивных луговых травостоев
Evaluation of economic efficiency of supeficial and radical improvement of low-yielding meadow plant formations
Evaluation of economic efficiency of supeficial and radical improvement of low-yielding meadow plant formations

person.name: Kovganov, V.F., Vitebsk State Academy of Veterinary Medicine (Belarus)

abstract.value: Modern process of the development of agricultural producing is characterized with the increase of its effectiveness. Efficiency of the feed production directly depends on intensification of grass sowing and maximal use of biological and climatic potential of perennial grasses, especially, leguminous grasses and cereal-leguminous mixtures. The article presents the results of studies of cost-effectiveness of the methods of improvement of low-productive old grass stands, cultivated on sod-podzolic loamy soils. Experiment has been containing of superficial and radical improvement of low-yielding meadow plant formations with the help of mineral fertilizers' application. Composition of producing expenses for different technologies of meadows' improvement has been analyzed; economic efficiency of the different improving methods has been evaluated; marginal revenue of superficial and radical technologies of improvement of low-productive grass stands has been calculated. The level of profitability has been composed 184,55-246,56% and 148,7-191,06% correspondingly.
